scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm -r run build
scripts.release: pnpm build && pnpm version-packages && pnpm publish
scripts.wipe-db: docker-compose down && docker volume rm electric_quickstart_postgres_data && docker-compose up -d
scripts.copy-env: for dir in packages/*; do cp .env "$dir/.env"; done
scripts.clean:cache: pnpm store prune && pnpm -r exec -- rm -rf node_modules && pnpm cache clean --all
